channel.title: H do i add a ::yell command to my server?source is deltascape v.2
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to add the yell command to my server?
The source is deltascape v2.

item.title: H do i add a ::yell command to my server?source is deltascape v.2
item.dc:creator: @knova knova
item.description:
@knova wrote:

Not going to teach u where to put itâ€¦
Client.java

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
if(yellon == true){
String yellText = command.substring(5);
if(!muted == true){
if(yellTimer > 0){
sM("You have to wait " + yellTimer + " seconds before you can yell again.");
} else {
yell(title = "" + playerName +": "+yellText);
yellTimer = 30;
}
} else {
sM("You are muted so you cannot Yell!");
}
}
}
if(yellon == false){
sM("Yell is currently disabled.");
}
public void yell(String message) {
		for (Player p : handler.players) {
			if ((message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0)
					|| (message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0))
				return;
			if ((p == null) || !p.isActive)
				continue;
			client temp = (client) p;
			if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0))
				if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive)
					temp.sM(message);
		}
	}

Player.java

public int yellTimer;
public boolean yellon = true;
public boolean yelloff = false;

Read full topic
